wikipedia_page.main:
Carrie Kabak (née Howells) is an author, artist, copywriter, and graphic designer. Born and raised in the United Kingdom, she now lives in Kansas City, Missouri.
Her first book, Cover the Butter, won an AudioFile Earphones Award in 2006. It was reviewed by Publishers Weekly, Booklist, Kirkus Reviews, and Library Journal.

response: *Carrie Kabak, an author and former children's book illustrator
